entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow or drizzle ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 late this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 5:54 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Clearing early in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:54 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
